courses.title: Courses
courses.description: The Doctor of Management Science program is designed to provide in-depth understanding of management concepts, theories, and applications.

items.title: Philosophy of Management Science
items.description: Studying the ontological, epistemological, and axiological foundations of management science.

items.title: Advanced Research Methodology
items.description: Deepening quantitative, qualitative, and mixed-method research methods.

items.title: Strategic Management Theory
items.description: Analysis of current strategic management theories and their applications.

items.title: Strategic Marketing Management
items.description: Developing marketing strategies in a global and digital context.
